title: Failed to process buffered lint

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code I ran `cargo check` on the following Rust project: https://github.com/nimiq/core-rs-albatross/tree/e7205ccd6fc9a481018dd01a2395f13a84b0d3bd, which tries to compile the `libp2p-mdns` crate. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.51.0-nightly (04caa632d 2021-01-30) binary: rustc commit-hash: 04caa632dd10c2bf64b69524c7f9c4c30a436877 commit-date: 2021-01-30 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.51.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0.1 ``` ### Error output ``` cargo check Compiling nimiq-jsonrpc-server v0.1.0 (https://github.com/nimiq/jsonrpc.git#1d17aa26) Checking crypto-primitives v0.1.0 (https://github.com/nimiq/zexe?branch=nimiq#d364f586) Compiling nimiq-jsonrpc-client v0.1.0 (https://github.com/nimiq/jsonrpc.git#1d17aa26) Checking libp2p-kad v0.28.0 Checking libp2p-mdns v0.28.0 Compiling libp2p-floodsub v0.27.0 error: internal compiler error: failed to process buffered lint here --> /home/stefan/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/libp2p-mdns-0.28.0/src/service.rs:293:37 | 293 | Err(err) => log::error!("if watch returned an error: {}", err), | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: delayed at /rustc/04caa632dd10c2bf64b69524c7f9c4c30a436877/compiler/rustc_lint/src/early.rs:384:18 = note: this error: internal compiler error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:974:13 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.51.0-nightly (04caa632d 2021-01-30) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `libp2p-mdns` To learn more, run the command again with --verbose. warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... error: internal compiler error: failed to process buffered lint here --> /home/stefan/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/libp2p-mdns-0.28.0/src/service.rs:293:37 | 293 | Err(err) => log::error!("if watch returned an error: {}", err), | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: delayed at /rustc/04caa632dd10c2bf64b69524c7f9c4c30a436877/compiler/rustc_lint/src/early.rs:384:18 = note: this error: internal compiler error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:974:13 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.51.0-nightly (04caa632d 2021-01-30) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: build failed ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:974:13 stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/04caa632dd10c2bf64b69524c7f9c4c30a436877/library/std/src/panicking.rs:493:5 1: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt at /rustc/04caa632dd10c2bf64b69524c7f9c4c30a436877/library/std/src/panicking.rs:435:5 2: rustc_errors::HandlerInner::flush_delayed 3: ::drop 4: core::ptr::drop_in_place 5: as core::ops::drop::Drop>::drop 6: core::ptr::drop_in_place 7: rustc_span::with_source_map 8: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run ```
